Publication Title: Virus hijacking of host epigenetic machinery to impair immune response
Publication Keywords: DNA methylation, Virus, Epigenetic, Immune Evasion, Host-virus Interaction, Histones Ptms
Publication Abstract: Epigenetic modifications, such as DNA hypermethylation, histone acetylation/methylation, or nucleosome positioning, result in differential gene expression. These modifications can have an impact on various pathways, including host antiviral immune responses.
